title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For a clearly labeled horizontal line for the truck

1 point is earned: For a clearly labeled straight line with positive slope for the car

1 point is earned: For the speed of the car ending higher than the speed of the truck at a time labeled to indicate that the house has been reached
descriptions:
Student response earns 0 of the following 3 point(s)

1 point is earned: For a clearly labeled horizontal line for the truck

1 point is earned: For a clearly labeled straight line with positive slope for the car

1 point is earned: For the speed of the car ending higher than the speed of the truck at a time labeled to indicate that the house has been reached

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Part(i)

1 point is earned: For indicating that student 1 is correct that the car and truck travel the same distance in the same time

1 point is earned: For identifying a feature of the graph that supports this: e.g., the area under both curves is the same, or the visual average of the speed of the car is the same as the speed of the truck

Part(ii)

1 point is earned: For indicating that student 2 is correct that the car’s speed is greater when the vehicles are in front of the house

1 point is earned: For identifying a feature of the graph that supports this: e.g., the final speed of the car is twice the speed of the truck

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For indicating that the final speed of the car is twice the speed of truck

1 point is earned: For applying any other appropriate kinematic relationship(s)

(2vt)2 = ve02 + 2aD

1 point is earned: For solving for the acceleration in terms of D and Vt

a = 2vt2/D
descriptions:
Student response earns 0 of the following 3 point(s)

1 point is earned: For indicating that the final speed of the car is twice the speed of truck

1 point is earned: For applying any other appropriate kinematic relationship(s)

(2vt)2 = ve02 + 2aD

1 point is earned: For solving for the acceleration in terms of D and Vt

a = 2vt2/D

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For indicating that the car and truck have the same speed at t = tD/2

1 point is earned: For a correct justification

Examples: That’s where the graphs intersect.

At tD the car’s speed is twice the truck’s speed, so they’ll be equal at tD/2
descriptions:

1 point is earned: For a correct justification
